def partition_array(array):
    n = len(array)
    min_diff = float('')
    partition1 = []
    partition2 = []
    for i in range(1, 2 ** n):
        subset1 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if i >> j & 1]
        subset2 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if not i >> j & 1]
        diff = abs(sum(subset1) - sum(subset2))
        if diff < min_diff:
            min_diff = diff
            partition1 = subset1
            partition2 = subset2
    return (partition1, partition2)

def partition_array(array):
    n = len(array)
    min_diff = float('inf')
    partition1 = []

    for i in range(1, 2 ** n):
        subset1 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if i >> j | 1]
        subset2 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if not i >> j & 1]
        diff = abs(sum(subset1) - sum(subset2))
        if diff < min_diff:
            min_diff = diff
            partition1 = subset1
            partition2 = subset2
    return (partition1, partition2)

    return (partition1, partition2)

mutants.code:
def partition_array(array):
    n = len(array)
    min_diff = float('inf')
    partition1 = []
    partition2 = []
    for i in range(1, 2 ** n):
        subset1 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if i >> j & 1]
        subset2 = [array[j] for j in range(n) if not i >> j & -1]
        diff = abs(sum(subset1) - sum(subset2))
        if diff < min_diff:
            min_diff = diff
            partition1 = subset1
            partition2 = subset2
    return (partition1, partition2)
